title: Who are the most underrated musicians from India? - Quora

response.answer_text: This answer was previously written by me and I am writing you the same with some minor updates in the name-list. XD I am a electronic music producer who has worked with B3NTE,EDWAN,AcestoAces and many more….. BEST is a very dominating word and discriminates the true potential of various artistes. As I can see that you are an Indian, you must be very proud that many indian producers have produce excellent tracks alas they are very underrated:cc In my playlist: Shanti people ( Excellent psy trance tracks and can compete with KSHMR[According to me])PROGRESSIVE BROTHERS ( OMG!! Superb talent and can compete with DVBBS,Bassjackers,Dimitri Vegas and Like Mike at any level)SU REALB-ProjektOX7GENRITVIZ (You might know him or maybe not)I gotta know bout them this year(I mean 2018) SUNBURN. GREAT TALENT SAD TO SEE THEM SO UNDERRATED IN OUR COUNTRY. LET’S PLEDGE TO SHOWCASE AND RESPECT THEIR TALENT AND BRING OUT THE NEXT MARTIN GARRIX FROM OUR BELOVED INDIA I have given my answer related to the electronic music community. Personally I have no knowledge about the Bollywood underrated music producers.Hope you get versatile answers from different music community. CHEERS!!!

All the musicians with big music directors went unnoticed in sand of time. But after the death of pancham da i.e. R D Burman ,all his musicians started a show called pancham magic in pune and this is how they all came in limelight e.g.Kersy lord, Katkar.,Homi mullan, Ranjit or kanchaji, Ramesh iyer. Music arrangers like sebastian d souza. Sapan jagmohan etc Percussiinists like lala abdul sattar ..tabla
